pages.text: This beverage, brewed from $(item)Chorus Fruit$(), inherits - and amplifies - not only the special taste, but also the unique property of the plant.$(br2)When ingested, this drink randomly teleports you over great distances. The higher the alcohol content, the further.

pages.title: Titration Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)Tastes like raspberry, but there are none in it at all. Strange.
